body: So when i copy something and worldedit, and i try and paste it, some dumb stuff happens. Basically, it doesnt paste where i want it to. It pastes like 3 vlocks next to me and 6 behind me.... i do //copy //rotate 90 //paste.
body_tagged: So when i copy something and worldedit, and i try and paste it, some dumb stuff happens. Basically, it doesnt paste where i want it to. It pastes like 3 vlocks next to me and 6 behind me.... i do //copy //rotate 90 //paste.
title: Why Is WE So Stupid?

replies.body:
make sure you copy your selection in the right spot
also, keep in mind, the direction you are facing matters, copying, and pasting.
replies.body_tagged:
make sure you copy your selection in the right spot
also, keep in mind, the direction you are facing matters, copying, and pasting.

replies.body: It doesnt paste where im looking it just teleports to some random place
replies.body_tagged: It doesnt paste where im looking it just teleports to some random place

replies.body: It won't paste where you look. It pastes based off of where you copied it. Lets say you have a square. You copy the square 3 blocks south of the edge of the square, then you rotate 90 and paste. Then it will paste 3 blocks west of where you are standing.
replies.body_tagged: It won't paste where you look. It pastes based off of where you copied it. Lets say you have a square. You copy the square 3 blocks south of the edge of the square, then you rotate 90 and paste. Then it will paste 3 blocks west of where you are standing.
